items.title: Signups are slowing down. -5% new than last week
items.caption: Tip: promote more your product online, and make sure to drive as much traffic as possible to the signup form. Here is a article on user acquisition

items.title: Form completion rate is good (20% conversion rate)
items.caption: Tip: You could increase conversion rates by asking fewer questions, making sure you are bringing qualified leads to your forms.

items.title: 80% of your signups are referrals, congrats!
items.caption: You are doing an outstanding job to motivating your users to invite their friends. Make sure to keep engaging with them with email marketing campaigns.

items.title: Growth tips for you to try next
items.caption: Have you considered created email flows to remind your subscribers to invite their friends and celebrate referrals milestones? Read this guide on how to do it
